de.mpa.client.ui

Class ExtensionFileFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.filechooser.FileFilter
      • de.mpa.client.ui.ExtensionFileFilter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultiExtensionFileFilter

    public class ExtensionFileFilter
extends FileFilter
    This class allows customizable file extension filtering.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    T. Muth, A. Behne

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExtensionFileFilter(String aExtension)
      Constructs a file filter that filters on the specified extension.

      Constructs a file filter that filters on the specified extension.
      ExtensionFileFilter(String aExtension, boolean aCaseSensitive, String aDescription)
      Constructs a file filter that filters on the specified extension.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExtensionFileFilter

        public ExtensionFileFilter(String aExtension)
        Constructs a file filter that filters on the specified extension.
        Parameters:
        aExtension - The extension String. Will automatically prepend '.' if not already present.

      • ExtensionFileFilter

        public ExtensionFileFilter(String aExtension,
                           boolean aCaseSensitive)
        Constructs a file filter that filters on the specified extension.
        Parameters:
        aExtension - The extension String. Will automatically prepend '.' if not already present.
        aCaseSensitive - boolean denoting case sensitivity. true if case-sensitive, false otherwise.

      • ExtensionFileFilter

        public ExtensionFileFilter(String aExtension,
                           boolean aCaseSensitive,
                           String aDescription)
        Constructs a file filter that filters on the specified extension.
        Parameters:
        aExtension - The extension String. Will automatically prepend '.' if not already present.
        aCaseSensitive - boolean denoting case sensitivity. true if case-sensitive, false otherwise.
        aDescription - The description String to be displayed in file chooser dialogs. Will use default ".ext files" pattern if null is provided.

    • Method Detail

      • accept

        public boolean accept(File pathname)
        This method checks whether the specified file is acceptable.
        Specified by:
        accept in class FileFilter
        Parameters:
        pathname - File with the full pathname for the file.
        Returns:
        true if the file is acceptable, false otherwise.

      • isCaseSensitive

        public boolean isCaseSensitive()
        Returns whether the filter is case-sensitive.
        Returns:
        true if the filter is case-sensitive, false otherwise.

      • getExtension

        public String getExtension()
        Returns the extension String.
        Returns:
        the extension String.

      • getDescription

        public String getDescription()
        The description of this filter. For example: "JPG and GIF Images"
        Specified by:
        getDescription in class FileFilter
        See Also:
        FileView.getName(java.io.File)
